ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve never even seen the Scryer, except one time as a corpse when I was exploring as a youngin.  The few times I have been in the room talking to campers he
ygData.messageBody:
I've never even seen the Scryer, except one time as a corpse when I was
exploring as a youngin. The few times I have been in the room talking to
campers he hasn't ever popped. How rare a spawn is he? Always wanted one
of them glowing shield thingees, just never could justify the cost. Now if
I could just get John to quantify the damage reduction one would see by
raising their AC by 5-6%...

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 9:41 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....


you paid 1600pp for a fork? geez you got bent over backwards on that
deal.... So often have i seen him up with a fork it isnt funny, i just run
by him to get to lower guk, oh look he's up and has a fork, kill /gu ok who
needs a fork...

I've killed him 3 times just runnin by him, and camped him for 1 once too.
traded one for black embroided sleeves. and gave 2 of em to buddies

Rakka
Sol Ro

>
> Yeah, I really wanted one =P
> Hmmm, I am 99% sure that my one doesn't have +10 magic, I'll check tonight

>
>
>

>
>
> 1600 pp?? for a runed bone fork??
>
> and yes, it's +10 MR also.
>
> Bien
>
> p.s. 1600pp??
>
